title: Bud Estes
text:
Bud Estes (October 4, 1946 – February 13, 2021) was an American politician. He was a <a href="Republican%20Party%20%28United%20States%29">Republican</a> member of the <a href="Kansas%20Senate">Kansas Senate</a> for the <a href="Kansas%27s%2038th%20Senate%20district">38th district</a>, from 2017 until his death, and previously served as the 119th district <a href="Kansas%20House%20of%20Representatives">state representative</a>. He also served as the <a href="mayor">mayor</a> of <a href="Bucklin%2C%20Kansas">Bucklin, Kansas</a> for fourteen years. Estes died in 2021 after being hospitalized due to a prolonged illness.
